meanings.definition: To make something a routine or regular practice.
meanings.sent1: She started routinising her morning exercise to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Every day, he routinises his work tasks to stay organized.
meanings.sent3: The cat routinised knocking over the vase every time someone walked by.
meanings.sent4: His daily routine was routinised like clockwork, never deviating.
meanings.sent5: The teacher routinised the students' homework assignments to ensure consistency.

meanings.definition: The act of establishing a routine or regular practice.
meanings.sent1: The routinising of daily chores made life easier for the family.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the routinising of her morning rituals.
meanings.sent3: The routinising of the office coffee break became a source of gossip.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the routinising of rush hour traffic was inevitable.
meanings.sent5: The routinising of his bedtime routine helped him fall asleep faster.
